ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Text(LOB__c) ='', $Profile.Name <>"02 NSC Administrator", $Profile.Name <>"04 NSC UI Administrator", User_Profile__c <>"90 Chatter Free", User_Profile__c <>"91 Chatter Free Moderator", User_Profile__c<>"99 Chatter Only Custom", User_Profile__c<>"Chatter External User", User_Profile__c<>"Chatter Free User", User_Profile__c<>"Chatter Moderator User", User_Profile__c<>"Chatter Only User" )
